text: Excited for all the joys, challenges and blessings ahead in 2014! #HappyNewYear to all.
Proud to support our #veterans and those serving in the military. Check out #wwe's annual #TributeToTheTroops tonight on @NBC!
#MerryChristmas to all! Best wishes for a happy holiday!
Saw Sgt. Dan Rose walking again thanks to @eksobionics & @soldiersocks. Amazing technology helping paralyzed vets! http://t.co/jSbUJZ8vDi
RIP #NelsonMandela, a leader who inspired the world with his courage, strength and kindness.
If you're shopping this weekend, please support your local small businesses! Check out my latest op-ed: http://t.co/JPB57YIfFR
In the kitchen today making my famous Hershey Pie with my granddaughters! What’s your family’s favorite Thanksgiving dish?
Had so much fun sitting ringside tonight for #WWE #RAW at Nassau Coliseum!
Happy to help Bridgeport's East End Community Council & Liberation Programs giving out 200 turkeys to those in need! http://t.co/N0leXIh4rN
Nice write-up by @CableFAX on my daughter @StephMcMahon and her recognition as a cable TV power woman! So proud. http://t.co/vo6RbCsSO2
RT @StephMcMahon: So proud to have my mom, @Linda_McMahon with me @CableFAX 2013 Most Powerful Women Breakfast #CableWomen http://t.co/3ZwF…
Great event supporting Inner City Foundation! It helps many groups + gives scholarships. So proud of these students! http://t.co/Y7pgles86u
Speaking at #MovesPowerWomen tonight: I believe we need more women in leadership-- in boardrooms, govt & community. http://t.co/AYvjoif3Rk
Honored to be one of this year's #MovesPowerWomen -- congrats to my fellow honorees! http://t.co/SWI2dbKo3P
First #snow of the season! Beautiful outside my window! http://t.co/TyIYHyBy3F
And a special note of gratitude to the families of our men & women in uniform, who have also made great sacrifices. #VeteransDay
A sincere, heartfelt thanks to all our veterans. Your service and sacrifice are greatly appreciated! #VeteransDay
RT @JaymeStevenson: Girlfriends...Pat Battle and I want to know when you had your last mammogram?#darien#breast cancer alliance http://t.co…
Great event, great cause! Breast Cancer Alliance fashion show raises $ to prevent, detect, treat & cure breast cancer http://t.co/ilhkdKFKdq
What a coup! Congratulations, Erin! @stewartfornb
Congratulations to @timherbst on his re-election in Trumbull!
Congratulations to #ChrisChristie on his re-election as NJ GOV!
It's #ElectionDay! I voted -- have you?
Toured Stamford's new Mill River Park: walking trails & cherry trees now; fountain, carousel & rink coming soon! http://t.co/5lpXtFdznu

October is Nat'l Women's Small Business Month. I'm passionate about helping women entrepreneurs! Check out my blog:
http://t.co/Zx9dNZWLX9
Thinking back on #SuperstormSandy & the losses our region sustained 1 year ago. My thoughts are w/all who continue to face challenges!
Great to see so many entrepreneurs, business leaders and advocates at today’s Women’s Business Development Council annual breakfast!
Proud to support #teachforamerica & the bright, energetic teachers bringing their talents to inner-city classrooms! http://t.co/G5S6Ux60q2

Nice coverage in the Fairfield County Business Journal of the event I emceed in honor of family-owned businesses!  
http://t.co/xvOalNIP0U
Very proud watching @StephMcMahon  mentoring future #FortuneMPW: all are daughters of members of our military. http://t.co/JLPMQQVZEW
Jobs session at #FortuneMPW discussing lack of skills & need for better cooperation w/ technical schools. A familiar theme from my campaign!
So cool to hear @diananyad discuss teamwork & mentoring at #FortuneMPW. Swam Cuba-FL @ 64: powerful, both physically & mentally. Inspiring!
Blown away by Glenn Close singing at #FortuneMPW. Even more shocking: @WarrenBuffett joining in on ukulele! http://t.co/pjQTk9SG5v
Great night at #FortuneMPW: had a fun chat w/ Leslie Stahl, who is writing a book on being a grandmother -- a role we both cherish!
RT @StephMcMahon: Proud to be at the #FortuneMPW with my mom @Linda_McMahon . The only mother/daughter tag team here! http://t.co/38fJui15Q2
Cheers to the women in the #USSenate working together to end the #shutdown: http://t.co/Q2bPEapVRG
Hosting @GovChristie , a big supporter of my Senate run. Great views on leadership as a Republican in a blue state. http://t.co/qBjIBBngDw
Thanks for all the birthday wishes! Celebrating with a treat I enjoy just once a year -- a maple frosted doughnut! http://t.co/jM1KQCpIb4

Forget the "War on Women." Let's declare a war FOR women. Check out my latest op-ed: 
http://t.co/Qs0Q7NQFCH
So proud of Sacred Heart U. football team, scoring a record 78 points in its homecoming victory over Chowan U.! http://t.co/vODkuBshfo
My thoughts and prayers are with the victims, survivors and families affected by today's shooting in DC's Navy Yard.
Rainbow outside my office window. Happy Friday, everyone! http://t.co/2romB23Lxd
My thoughts and prayers to those who lost loved ones on 9/11 #WeWillNeverForget
Looking forward to celebrating w/@timherbst when he's elected to a 3rd term as Trumbull First Selectman in November! http://t.co/rOMp66SSZi
Are you kidding? Congress members & staffs won't have same costs for Obamacare as the rest of us. Taxpayers  will pay their premiums. Fair?

The President is making speeches on job growth. What do you think of his ideas? Check out my blog @huffingtonpost: 
http://t.co/9LpkwB3vlg
Congratulations to the British royal family on the birth of a healthy baby boy. Such a joyful day for the country!
Last drive in the campaign car! Donating it to Inspirica, which serves 700+ homeless people a year in Stamford. http://t.co/ZrCuCVovTL
Posing for a photo for the @apcoworldwide website. Feels like school picture day! http://t.co/x9v7p3oZoT
Happy 4th! Best wishes for a safe, fun holiday as we celebrate our nation's independence. Special thanks to #vets who preserve our freedom.
Excited to work w/ @BobbyValentine, @sacredheartuniv AD, as new chair of the board's Student Affairs/Athletics Cmte! http://t.co/pyQXGPnsZ0
Excited for my next challenge: working w/Int'l Advisory Council @apcoworldwide to help businesses grow & succeed! http://t.co/yQssLJpSN9
I believe that today's landmark Supreme Court decision is a step toward equal rights and responsibilities for all.
Honored to be the keynote speaker @WAGmagazine #40Under40 event: such great, young talent in our community! http://t.co/SOPu0jBDuc
My grandkids would love this! http://t.co/BZ3J7j54vz
Dinner at an authentic Sichuan "hot pot" restaurant lived up to its name. Hot stuff! http://t.co/RlRSn5X8hp
I am used to living in a land of giants, but I have never felt quite this short! http://t.co/4E6AwJN5aC
A wonderful welcome in Chengdu, China. How cute are these kids? http://t.co/nobSZJx7vG
Speaking at a panel on connecting with women in emerging markets at #FortuneGlobal Forum. Great audience questions! http://t.co/tmdR8coIRC
Guess I need to work on my core. http://t.co/RqRlMYuKvi
Six bears for my six grandbabies! http://t.co/bJPNOMeYpo
Always fun to meet WWE fans, especially halfway around the world! http://t.co/QbWf0Ygmff
So cool to meet Yang Lan, known as the "Oprah" of China. She's a TV host, media mogul & strong advocate for women. http://t.co/nyMo6uo3L4
Great talk @ Most Powerful Women breakfast @ Fortune Global Forum on finding our voice. If we don't speak up, others may not see a problem.
Being interviewed by Chinese media. I hope I'm translated well! http://t.co/Ky9tg9Ku2Y
Having dinner in a restaurant in China -- so unusual to see people smoking indoors!
Made it to Chengdu, China... 26 hours after leaving home!
Just met someone from Trumbull, CT, in the Tokyo airport. Nutmeggers all over the world!
Konnichiwa from Tokyo! I'm in Japan heading to Chengdu, China for the Fortune Global Forum. Looking forward to an insightful conference!
Having a wonderful evening.  Dinner with my awesome daughter.
Inspiring talk by WI @govwalker at #ctgop dinner on governing w/eye on next generation, not just next election. http://t.co/zN4eNofnzd
Stunned by the devastation in Oklahoma. Prayers to all affected by this powerful tornado.
Back at the #WWE studios taping some interviews for future DVDs. Such a talented team and an amazing facility! http://t.co/IRlGHt6aVn
My pear trees look like popcorn! http://t.co/LjsdfNp14t
Honored w/Public Service Award from Women's National Republican Club. Even happier to share it w/my mom & daughter! http://t.co/LdLFgBh6KZ
Prayers to all in Boston this Patriots Day as wait to learn more about the tragic explosions.
Great to meet Madeleine Albright @ event for Fairfield Cty Community Foundation's Fund for Women & Girls. Inspiring! http://t.co/vvkrTPv9wx
Go UConn women.  Take down Louisville tonight!
I hope all of you who watched #WrestleMania enjoyed it as much as I did!
My son-in-law wins! #WrestleMania http://t.co/judllNkYWI
Nice to have a bird's eye view of all the action! The roar of over 80,000 people is so phenomenal! #WrestleMania http://t.co/SbnL00TE0w

Enjoying a spectacular show! Anyone else watching? http://t.co/tdwKayn6Ka
Join me in marking #InternationalWomen'sDay, honoring women's achievements, promoting equal opportunities & empowering women to succeed.
#Sequestration debate isn't about whether you're for or against the cuts, it's about Congress' failure to do its job 18 MONTHS ago.
